name: isSafeHTML
description: Checks a HTML string against antisamy policy file to determine if it may be vulnerable to XSS / Cross Site Scripting.

params.description: File path for custom AntiSamy policy file. Can be defined in the application scope or if not defined will use Coldfusion server default
params.name: PolicyFile

examples.title: Unsafe HTML Example
examples.description: Example with HTML that causes isSafeHTML to return false.

examples.title: Safe HTML Example
examples.description: Example with HTML that is safe on the default policy.
examples.code: Foundeo Inc. #isSafeHTML(html)#
